meanings.definition: Covered in or consisting of gunk or grime
meanings.sent1: The old car was the gungiest vehicle in the entire parking lot.
meanings.sent2: After playing in the mud, her clothes were the gungiest of all her friends.
meanings.sent3: The gungiest socks in the laundry basket seemed to have a life of their own.
meanings.sent4: The gungiest corners of the attic held forgotten treasures from years past.
meanings.sent5: The gungiest parts of the city were often ignored by visitors.

meanings.sent1: He was known as the gungiest person in the neighborhood due to his unkempt appearance.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned house on the street was the gungiest building in the area.
meanings.sent3: The gungiest Halloween costume at the party was surprisingly the most popular.
meanings.sent4: The gungiest task of the day was cleaning out the clogged drain.
meanings.sent5: The gungiest character in the story turned out to be the hero in disguise.

meanings.sent1: She accidentally gungied up her shoes while walking through the muddy field.
meanings.sent2: The kids managed to gungi up the entire playground with their muddy footprints.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy gungied the clean kitchen floor with its wet paws.
meanings.sent4: The rainstorm gungied the freshly washed car in a matter of minutes.
meanings.sent5: The artist intentionally gungied the canvas to create a unique texture in the painting.
